step.name: PausePause
step.start-script:
def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version.
chart.stepTotalPause+=chart.pausedTime chart.pausedTime=0 chart.pauseStart=system.date.now()

step.name: PauseTicker
step.start-script: def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version. nowTime=system.date.now() chart.pausedTime=system.date.secondsBetween(chart.pauseStart, nowTime) chart.estEndTime=0

step.name: F1
step.start-script:
def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version.
#write to tag and check to see if value was written p1=chart.param1 t1=chart.targetPath1 system.tag.writeBlocking([t1], [p1]) val=system.tag.readBlocking([t1])[0].value if val==p1: chart.stepComplete=True

step.name: F2
step.start-script:
def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version.
p1=chart.param1 p2=chart.param2 p3=chart.param3 tagPath=chart.targetPath1 if chart.stepStartValue is None: chart.stepStartValue=system.tag.readBlocking([tagPath])[0].value
StepStartValue=chart.stepStartValue StepStartTime=chart.stepStartTime pause=chart.stepTotalPause pauseAction=chart.pauseAction
#0=maintain #1=hold currentValue=system.tag.readBlocking([tagPath])[0].value
base=0
if pauseAction==1: StepStartTime=system.date.addSeconds(StepStartTime,pause) #determine the direction of the ramp up or down if p2>=0: rampup=True else: rampup=False
#time right now nowTime=system.date.now()
#time between now and stepStart elapseSeconds=system.date.secondsBetween(StepStartTime,nowTime)
#change base rate to seconds so it updates the ramping value every second if p3==0: base=3600 elif p3==1: base=60 elif p3==2: base=1
#converts set ramp rate to x per second rampSeconds=p2/base
#determines what the value should be now value=elapseSeconds*rampSeconds+StepStartValue totalTime=abs(1/rampSeconds)*abs(chart.stepStartValue-p1) #if the ramp is upwards, return target if new value is greater than the target, otherwise return the new value
if rampup: if value>=p1: output=p1 else: output=value #if the ramp is downwards, return target if new value is less than the target, otherwise return the new value else: if value<=p1: output=p1 else: output=value
system.tag.writeBlocking([tagPath], [output]) chart.estEndTime=system.date.addSeconds(StepStartTime,int(totalTime))

step.name: F2Check
F3
F1Complete
step.start-script: def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version. if chart.stepNum==len(chart.startStops): chart.startStops.append(system.date.now()) else: chart.startStops[chart.stepNum]=system.date.now() chart.stepNum=chart.stepNum+1 if chart.stepNum>chart.totalSteps: chart.endOfRecipe=True else: #run a named query to get next step parameters params={"recipeId":chart.recipeId, "recipeStep":chart.stepNum} stepData=system.db.runNamedQuery("Exchange/SFC Recipe Handler/Query Recipe Step by Recipe",params) if stepData.getRowCount()==0: chart.endOfRecipe=True else: chart.function=stepData.getValueAt(0,"recipe_function") chart.param1=stepData.getValueAt(0,"p1") chart.param2=stepData.getValueAt(0,"p2") chart.param3=stepData.getValueAt(0,"p3") chart.targetPath1=stepData.getValueAt(0,"t1") chart.pauseAction=stepData.getValueAt(0,"pause_action") chart.stepStartTime=system.date.now() chart.stepTotalPause=0 chart.stepComplete=False chart.pausedTime=0 chart.stepStartValue=None chart.gHoldStart=0 chart.gHoldActive=False chart.estEndTime=0 chart.prescribedPause=False chart.writeString=None chart.f7Message=False

step.name: F2Complete
step.start-script: def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version. if chart.stepNum==len(chart.startStops): chart.startStops.append(system.date.now()) else: chart.startStops[chart.stepNum]=system.date.now() chart.stepNum=chart.stepNum+1 if chart.stepNum>chart.totalSteps: chart.endOfRecipe=True else: #run a named query to get next step parameters params={"recipeId":chart.recipeId, "recipeStep":chart.stepNum} stepData=system.db.runNamedQuery("Exchange/SFC Recipe Handler/Query Recipe Step by Recipe",params) if stepData.getRowCount()==0: chart.endOfRecipe=True else: chart.function=stepData.getValueAt(0,"recipe_function") chart.param1=stepData.getValueAt(0,"p1") chart.param2=stepData.getValueAt(0,"p2") chart.param3=stepData.getValueAt(0,"p3") chart.targetPath1=stepData.getValueAt(0,"t1") chart.pauseAction=stepData.getValueAt(0,"pause_action") chart.stepStartTime=system.date.now() chart.stepTotalPause=0 chart.stepComplete=False chart.pausedTime=0 chart.stepStartValue=None chart.gHoldStart=0 chart.gHoldActive=False chart.estEndTime=0 chart.prescribedPause=False chart.writeString=None chart.f7Message=False

step.name: F4
step.start-script:
def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version. p1=chart.param1 p2=chart.param2 p3=chart.param3 tagPath=chart.targetPath1 HoldStartTime=chart.stepStartTime
currentValue=system.tag.readBlocking([tagPath])[0].value upperbound=p1+p2 lowerbound=p1-p2 targetAchieved=False #check if the temperature is within the desired range if currentValue>=lowerbound and currentValue<=upperbound: status= True else: status= False
#if in temp range begin hold timer if status and chart.gHoldStart==0: chart.gHoldStart=system.date.now() chart.estEndTime=system.date.addMinutes(system.date.now(), int(p3)) chart.gHoldActive=True
elif status==False: chart.gHoldStart=0 chart.gHoldActive=False chart.estEndTime=0

step.name: F4Check
step.start-script: def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version. #check if hold timer has elapse p3=chart.param3 if chart.gHoldActive: targetSec=int(p3)*60 nowTime=system.date.now() endTime=system.date.addSeconds(chart.gHoldStart,targetSec) if nowTime>=endTime: chart.stepComplete= True

step.name: sendShutdown
step.start-script: def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version. chart.project=system.util.getProjectName() payload={"instanceId":chart.instanceId, "SFCName": chart.SFCName} system.util.sendMessage(project=chart.project, messageHandler='shutdownGW', payload=payload)

step.name: F3Complete
step.start-script: def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version. if chart.stepNum==len(chart.startStops): chart.startStops.append(system.date.now()) else: chart.startStops[chart.stepNum]=system.date.now() chart.stepNum=chart.stepNum+1 if chart.stepNum>chart.totalSteps: chart.endOfRecipe=True else: #run a named query to get next step parameters params={"recipeId":chart.recipeId, "recipeStep":chart.stepNum} stepData=system.db.runNamedQuery("Exchange/SFC Recipe Handler/Query Recipe Step by Recipe",params) if stepData.getRowCount()==0: chart.endOfRecipe=True else: chart.function=stepData.getValueAt(0,"recipe_function") chart.param1=stepData.getValueAt(0,"p1") chart.param2=stepData.getValueAt(0,"p2") chart.param3=stepData.getValueAt(0,"p3") chart.targetPath1=stepData.getValueAt(0,"t1") chart.pauseAction=stepData.getValueAt(0,"pause_action") chart.stepStartTime=system.date.now() chart.stepTotalPause=0 chart.stepComplete=False chart.pausedTime=0 chart.stepStartValue=None chart.gHoldStart=0 chart.gHoldActive=False chart.estEndTime=0 chart.prescribedPause=False chart.writeString=None chart.f7Message=False

step.name: F5
step.start-script:
def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version. #check if tag value has achieved a target p1=chart.param1 p2=chart.param2 tagPath=chart.targetPath1
currentValue=system.tag.readBlocking([tagPath])[0].value
if (p2==0 and currentValue==p1) or (p2==1 and currentValue>=p1) or (p2==2 and currentValue<=p1): chart.stepComplete=True chart.estEndTime=0

step.name: F4Complete

step.name: F6
step.start-script: def onStart(chart, step): # WARNING: This resource was generated in a newer version of Ignition. For the best editing experience, recreate it in the current version. #programmatically pause the recipe if chart.prescribedPause==False: chart.paused=True chart.prescribedPause=True elif chart.prescribedPause==True and chart.paused==False: chart.stepComplete=True
